description:
Samui is a kunoichi of http://anidb.net/ch12205 [Kumogakure], and the leader of Team Samui.
She has short blond hair just around her chin, she wears a revealing skirt with a shirt, and has a body comparable to that of http://anidb.net/ch8606 [Tsunade], since she has fair skin, blond hair, large breasts, and appears very seductive. As opposed to her two talkative teammates, Samui is mature, calm, and generally silent, only speaking when needed.
name: Samui
